description.content: The initial text to which the suffix will be appended.

documentation.content: The base text string that will have another string appended to its end.

description.content: The text to append to the original value.

documentation.content: The text string that will be concatenated to the end of the original text.

description.content: Concatenates the suffix text to the end of the original text.

documentation.content: Returns a new text string consisting of the original text followed by the specified suffix.
